reuters.title: NORTH ATLANTIC TECHNOLOGIES <NATT> 4TH QTR
reuters.body: Shr loss 20 cts vs loss 14 cts Net loss 352,000 vs loss 248,000 Revs 285,000 vs 681,000 Year Shr loss 92 cts vs loss 49 cts Net loss 1,613,000 vs loss 842,000 Revs 1,523,000 vs 2,557,000 NOTE: Full name is North Atlantic Technologies Inc Reuter 
